data.title: RugbyFromAWheelchair
data.meta_description: 10 posts published by rugbyfromawheelchair during May 2013
data.text:
This South African loving Australian resides in Melbourne. Rugbyfromawheelchair caught up with Mindy too try find out her age and get her thoughts on all things rugby. Oh and she loves Bismarck du Plessis.

Age:

Let‚Äôs say ‚Äúold enough to remember the 80s, young enough to not know the 70s‚Äù üòâ

Occupation:

Day job ‚Äì litigation, evening job ‚Äì sports writer.

Which Super Rugby team do you support:

Melbourne Rebels.

Seeing that you are Australian, where does your love for South Africa stem from:

One of my earliest memories as a young kid is of watching Kepler Wessels open for Australia ‚Äì my dad told me the story of the sanctions and so I decided when I was 7 that I was moving to Bloemfontein. (Yet to happen ‚Äì probably a good thing).

Who do you think will take the series between Australia and the British & Irish Lions, loyalties aside:

Some selection surprises to come for Australian rugby with the Lions tour, but think it will be 2-1 to the Aussies. And close matches too!

If you could change one thing about rugby what would it be?

Either the inconsistencies with TMO usage during a match, or the citing process post match. Too many incidents that are well documented which are either let off or not cited at all. Not only creates confusion but creates unnecessary division on and off the pitch.

‚ÄúRugby & more‚Äù
